headline: The Top 3 Sources Of Income For The Average Retiree
summary: There are many institutions in place to help ensure that aging out of a consistent paycheck is far from a death sentence for the average American's finances.

headline: Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) Stands to Benefit as BofA Highlights Sector Tailwinds
summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is included among Dividend Contenders List: Top 20 Stocks. On January 21, BofA raised its price target on Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) to $350 from $320, while maintaining a Buy rating on the stock. The move came alongside a broader update to the bank’s diversified analog semiconductor coverage, with higher targets […]

headline: Trump's proposed credit card rate cap: Sheila Bair weighs in
summary: President Trump called on Congress to implement a 10% cap on credit card interest rates. JPMorgan (JPM) CEO Jamie Dimon said this would create an "economic disaster." Sheila Bair, former chair of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), sits down with Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton to discuss the proposal and banks' reactions. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: Limbo for Longer: Don’t Expect More Fed Rate Cuts Before Mid-2026
summary: 2026 presents a catch-22 for the Fed. It normally cuts rates to buoy hiring, which tightened last year, but that could drive up inflation.

headline: Bank of America (BAC) Faces Long-Term Risks From Rising Expense Pressures
summary: Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) ranks among the best financial stocks to buy according to billionaire Israel Englander. On January 7, Wolfe Research downgraded Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) from Outperform to Peer Perform, citing limited growth and concerns about a rise in expenses in 2026.
